summary: This is a simple mod that plays audible breaths from your character when your health/stamina/magicka drops below a certain percentage.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48172-1-1391391586.png[/img]
[size=5][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HkaFjXDxYjA]Preview[/url][/size][/center]
[color=#888888][size=4]Version:[/size][/color]
1.01
[list]
[*]Fixed an issue where females were played the male sound effect on new saves. If experiencing the issue, simply save and restart Skyrim.[/list]
[color=#888888][size=4]Compatibility:[/size][/color]

Compatible with all mods. Load order doesn't matter.

[color=#888888][size=4]Overview:[/size][/color]

This is a simple mod that plays audible breaths from your character when your health/stamina/magicka drops below a certain percentage. The rate at which you breathe increases as your health/stamina/magicka drops. This is a player-only effect with male or female sound effects automatically set depending on your sex.

By default, once your health and/or stamina drops below 50%, the breaths will trigger. To better suit your playstyle and/or gameplay mod selection, you can configure which resources (health/stamina/magicka) trigger the breaths, the percentage at which they will trigger and the volume. Configuration requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] but they are not required to run the mod at default settings. There are no plans to sync the breathing with Wet and Cold's breath effect.

[color=#888888][size=4]Install:[/size][/color]

Manual installers drop the files into your Data folder. NMM/BAIN: download the main file and add to your respective programs.

[color=#888888][size=4]Update:[/size][/color]

This mod automatically refreshes itself with each revision. Just remove the previous version and install the new version.

[color=#888888][size=4]Uninstall:[/size][/color]

Remove all installed files.
